name: Newborn Armed Forces
description: Our military was disbanded a century ago, and we will need great, sweeping efforts to establish a modern fighting force.

name: The Riograndense Armed Forces
description: Our armed forces organisation continues; now with special naval, aerial and ground branches, we will forge our military into the envy of all.

name: Artillery Battalions
description: Our artillery pieces are not up the standards of modern warfare, especially when considering the relative abundance of them in our armed forces.

name: Modern Combat Doctrine
description: The ways of war are ever changing, and our rising nation will not cling to old ideas and principles, but to what is truly shaping the modern battlefield.

name: Infantry Equipment Manufacturing
description: In order to ensure our safety, we need to ensure our armed forces are well armed enough to defend us.

name: Military Technology Effort
description: If we fail to adapt to the new mechanisms of war, we will fall just like our forerunners did a century ago.

name: Tattered Spirit
description: A cult of offence arises in our reborn military, an élan based on the bravery of our soldiers, then and now.

name: Navy of Rio Grande
description: In order to protect our coastline, from Chuí to Paranágua bay, we need a navy, and and organised and staffed one as well. This will take some effort, however.

name: Lavoro Famoso
description: Our Republic is based on the legacy our our founding fathers, among these the military genius Giuseppe Garibaldi, whose Lavoro Famoso is a mark in the skill of battlefield mobility. Such legacy heavily influences the officers of our young Republic.

name: Modernise Porto Alegre Shipyards
description: Porto Alegre has been a trading port for many years, but its shipyards are ill-suited for military proposes. We we will attempt to change that as fast as possible.

name: Sea Brigands
description: Submarines are an effective way for a small navy such as ours to be effective on modern war, and thus they will be our focus.

name: Specialist Training
description: The best of the best will be gathered to train an elite force that will fight the most important battles in our young history.

name: Air Force of Rio Grande
description: We will establish a modern air force, one that can stand to the challenges of modern war.

name: Aviation Schools
description: Our new and few airplanes will need skilled pilots, and thus our aviation and flying schools will provide us with the best of the best among us.

name: Bomber Aircraft Focus
description: Hitting targets from incredible heights and maintaining a hold of a heavy bomber are hard enough tasks, we need no need to make them harder by forcing our men to pilot museum pieces!

name: Dive Bombing Training
description: Our best bombers will ensure that we can control the battlefield, by providing close air support to our army.

name: Divisões Paraquedistas
description: A well done paradrop can change a war, and thus we will ensure that our staff and soldiers are ready to properly do their duty.

name: Complete Army Reform
description: Now our army has been reborn, and we truly have a modern force, worthy of parading in Porto Alegre and of defending our republic both from invaders and northern aggression.

name: Rio Grande Reborn
description: May our deeds be an example to all of the Earth!

name: Government Rebuilding
description: Rebuilding a government after a century of occupation is no simple matter.

name: Efficient Rule
description: The people already feel safer and better off under us than under Northern Occupation, and thus we have more leeway for more sweeping reforms.

name: Consolidated State Policies
description: The government of our young state has finally put together an efficient government plan, and is reaping benefits from enacting it in practice.

name: First Census of the Republic
description: In order to properly plan for the future, we must assess the present; a through census will be made, and we will be able to start our economic efforts.

name: Infrastructure Renewal
description: The beaten tracks Brazil bothered to build in our lands are no proper way of travel; modernity much reach all corners of the Republic.

name: Rekindle Local Manufacturing
description: Predatory Brazilian practices have prevented the hardworking Riograndense people to reach their manufacturing potential. No more!

name: Plan Gonçalves
description: Sweeping reform of our industries will commence, as so to keep it in par with the most modern on earth!

name: Infrastructure Investments
description: We will redouble our infrastructure efforts, and ensure our major cities are well linked.

name: Heavy Industry Incentives
description: We will do heavy industry a favour, and ensure it can do its part in rebuilding Rio Grande.

name: Extensive Education Reform
description: Our education system is still too Brazilian to be effective; sweeping reforms are in order.

name: Extensive Industrialisation
description: The next step of plan Gonçalves begins: The building of said modern facilities.

name: Military Industrial Contracts
description: We should invest in our military through contracts to create more weapons.

name: Military Industrial Complex
description: We will ensure the best, brightest and most capable men are working on the equipment of our armed forces.
